description: Petitioner Joyce Brettell filed a complaint of discrimination pursuant to the Florida Civil Rights Act of 1992, Sections 760.01 - 760.11, Florida Statutes (1997), alleging that Respondent Joseph L. Morse Geriatric Center committed an unlawful employment practice on the basis of Petitioner’s handicap and on the basis of retaliation.Petitioner requested an administrative hearing, and the case was transmitted to the Division of Administrative Hearings for the conduct of a formal proceeding.An evidentiary hearing was held in West Palm Beach, Florida, on September 25, 2000, before Administrative Law Judge Susan B. Kirkland.Judge Kirkland issued a Recommended Order of dismissal, dated December 7, 2000.The Commission panel designated below considered the record of this matter and determined the action to be taken on the Recommended Order.

heading_1_text: Petitioner Joyce Brettell filed a complaint of discrimination pursuant to the Florida Civil Rights Act of 1992, Sections 760.01 - 760.11, Florida Statutes (1997), alleging that Respondent Joseph L. Morse Geriatric Center committed an unlawful employment practice on the basis of Petitioner’s handicap and on the basis of retaliation.Petitioner requested an administrative hearing, and the case was transmitted to the Division of Administrative Hearings for the conduct of a formal proceeding.An evidentiary hearing was held in West Palm Beach, Florida, on September 25, 2000, before Administrative Law Judge Susan B. Kirkland.Judge Kirkland issued a Recommended Order of dismissal, dated December 7, 2000.The Commission panel designated below considered the record of this matter and determined the action to be taken on the Recommended Order.
heading_3_text: We find the Administrative Law Judge’s application of the law to the facts to result in a correct disposition of the matter.            We adopt the Administrative Law Judge’s conclusions of law.
heading_4_text: Neither party filed exceptions to the Administrative Law Judge’s Recommended Order.

title.description: FINAL ORDER DISMISSING REQUEST FORRELIEF FROM AN UNLAWFUL EMPLOYMENT PRACTICE
